title: Decide on matters where it is observed that there is an error in any order, requirement decision, and determination of interpretation made by him or by an Officer authorized by him in the application of these Regulations

section: Qualification and Competence of the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Structural Engineer / Town Planner / Supervisor
